name: Spaceship Escape (ngtzzz)
description:
My game: Spaceship Escape

Added:

  1. New Giant Pickup with unique effect (make you larger and faster) and sprite
  2. New Tiny Pickup with make you smaller and sprite
  3. Create level boss
  4. Add 3 complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent levels
  5. They are in a logical progession with you must find your way to escape
